ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: failed to import meta data
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Please enter the following details** Background: I have 2 nocodb instances, lets say A and B. I want to migrate from A to B. I exported metadata from A as meta.zip, then i take a snapshot from Database-A to create Database-B. A project in B is also configured. **Steps To Reproduce** 1. In B, click ``Import Metadata`` (either in My Projects page or in Metadata Operations) 2. It toasts "Some internal error occurred". 3. In Network tab (Chrome), it shows ``{msg: "Malformed UTF-8 data"}`` when calling ``xcMetaTablesImportZipToLocalFsAndDb``. P.S. There is no server logs related to this import action. **Expected behavior** The project meta zip can be imported. Node: **v12.22.1** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **true** Database: **pg** ProjectOnRootDB: **false** RootDB: **pg** PackageVersion: **0.10.3**

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: feat: Add option to show m2m tables re #388 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <61551451+pranavxc@users.noreply.github.com>
